security_compliance_pipeline.description: Pipeline for security and compliance diagnostics including SSL checks, port vulnerability scans, subdomain enumeration, and CSP reports.

ssl_check.description: Check SSL certificate details for a domain.

port_vulnerability_scan.description: Scan ports on a host for vulnerabilities using nmap.

subdomain_enumeration.description: Enumerate subdomains for a given domain.

csp_report.description: Generate a Content Security Policy (CSP) report for a domain.

security_headers_check.description: Check security headers of a website for best practices.

vulnerability_check.description: Perform a basic vulnerability check on a domain.
